attributes.action: Remove the polices ability to search home computers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are strict laws about the police not being allowed into our houses to search through our things (without cause) but recently they have been allowed to "hack" our computers which in a lot of cases can contain more information (our friends, family, our thoughts). Our computer data should be just as  private our phone books, diaries journals or medical records (all of which could be on our computer).

rejection.details: The information in your petition cannot be verified so it cannot be accepted as currently worded.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
